Title: Children of Earth, Day Three
Plot: The eyes of the world turn to Britain, as the 456 announce, 'We are here'. As a pillar of fire descends upon London, the members of Torchwood must battle to protect their own families, as the fight gets personal. But will Clem's memories destroy everything?
GuestStars: Kai Owen, Peter Capaldi, Paul Copley, Nicholas Farrell, Susan Brown, Lucy Cohu, Cush Jumbo, Liz May Brice, Ian Gelder, Colin McFarlane, Deborah Findlay, Nicholas Briggs, Patric Naiambana, Tom Price, Charles Abomeli
